expo.name: Healthy Foodie
expo.description: Your personalized healthy menu for every restaurant. Get AI-powered meal recommendations based on your fitness goals.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to identify restaurants and provide personalized meal recommendations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to let you select restaurant photos for meal recommendations.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Healthy Foodie to access your camera to identify restaurants and provide meal recommendations.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Healthy Foodie to access your photos to help identify restaurants.
